amendment.description: Amendment prohibits military-to-military exchanges that involve the training of the People's Liberation Army of China by U.S. Armed Forces.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 12 and printed in part A of H. Rept. 106-175 to prohibit military-to-military exchanges that involve the training of the People's Liberation Army of China by U.S. armed forces.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeLay amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 284 - 143 (Roll no. 182).
